title: A Motivic Riemann-Roch Theorem for Deligne-Mumford Stacks
authors: Utsav Choudhury, Neeraj Deshmukh, Amit Hogadi
abstract:
We develop a motivic cohomology theory, representable in the Voevodsky's
triangulated category of motives, for smooth separated Deligne-Mumford stacks
and show that the resulting higher Chow groups are canonically isomorphic to
the higher $K$-theory of such stacks. This generalises the
Grothendieck-Riemann-Roch theorem to the category of smooth Deligne-Mumford
stacks.
